Add your model to the `models.json`, with the following format:

```
  "model-003":{
    "task":"segmentation",
    "model":"github.com/alan-turing-institute/cv-algortithm",
    "github_branch":"master",
    "language":"Python3",
    "data_format":"tif",
    "pretrained":"yes",
    "labels_required":"yes",
    "institution":"alan-turing-institute",
    "tags": ["dummy"]
  }
```
